sentence.Network_en: Employees are paid salaries commensurate with those of teachers.
sentence.Network_cn: 给员工的薪水与老师拿的薪水相当。

sentence.Network_en: Managers saw a commensurate fall in their revenues.
sentence.Network_cn: 经理们发现自己的收入相应地减少了。

sentence.Network_en: Salary will be commensurate with experience.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... suppurate （伤口）化脓 commensurate 同样大小的，相称的 incommensurate 不成比.
commensurable 可公度的commensurate 同量的comment card 注释卡
commemorate vt. 纪念commensurate adj. 相应的，相称的comment n. 注释，评论；vi. 谈及；注释，评论.

...commensurate incommensurate transition 适应不适应转变commensurate structure 适应结构common emitter circuit 共同发射电路
commensurable 等量的commensurable measure 有公比量数comment 评价

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from late Latin commensuratus, from com- 'together' + mensuratus, past participle of mensurare 'to measure'

entry.def: If the level of one thing is commensurate with another, the first level is in proportion to the second.

example.ex: Employees are paid salaries commensurate with those of teachers...
example.tran: 给员工的薪水与老师拿的薪水相当。

example.ex: Managers saw a commensurate fall in their revenues.
example.tran: 经理们发现自己的收入相应地减少了。

means.word_mean: 1. corresponding in size or degree or extent;

sentences.sentence: "pay should be commensurate with the time worked"

auth_sentence.content: Pay will be commensurate with experience and qualifications.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pay will be commensurate with experience and qualifications.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pay will be commensurate with experience and qualifications.

auth_sentence.content: Salary is commensurate with experience and NIH guidelines.
auth_sentence.res_content: Salary is commensurate with experience and NIH guidelines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Salary is commensurate with experience and NIH guidelines.

auth_sentence.content: Rank will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rank will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rank will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.

stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+mens计量,测量+urate=ate表形容词→测量尺寸相同

stems_affixes.value_cn: 广大的,巨大的;[口]极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: im不+mens计量,测量+e→不能测量→无限的
di分开+mens测量+ion表名词→分开量→量出→计算面积

sentences.en: Six yards is commensurate with eighteen feet.
Nothing he does is commensurate to our desire.
sentences.cn: 他做的事没一件使我们称心。

sentences.en: The pay should be commensurate with the work.
sentences.cn: 工资应与工作相称才是。
